name: The Grim Reader
description:
A 3D platformer reading game! Insert any text or choose and test some pre-loaded content! Challenge your reading experiences and enter the THE GRIM READER's world! As you'll be able to see, this is an early-access alpha version of the project. The idea is to be able to build a 3D platformer centered around reading input content. The game could then be used as a teaching, studying or learning tool. Future updates should include:
  • more interaction mechanics
  • accessibility options
  • text processing modes
  • different characters
  • story line development
--> On most days, you can watch me improve the game right here. --> Check our discussion board below if you feel like contributing with any ideas! --> You can read a little about the game's design process and the educational ideas behind it here.
